prompt.goal: Initialize Node.js Project with npm. This is the foundational task to establish the project's base.

context.description: This is the foundational task to establish the project's base. It involves creating the `package.json` file, which will serve as the project's manifest, managing its dependencies, scripts, and metadata.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: The `npm init -y` command is executed in the project root.
A `package.json` file is successfully created in the root directory.
The `package.json` file contains the default sections (name, version, description, main, scripts, keywords, author, license).
